meanings.definition: A fur or skin, especially of a marten or mink.
meanings.sent1: The plew of the marten was soft and warm.
meanings.sent2: She wore a coat with a plew collar.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten played with the plew, thinking it was a toy.
meanings.sent4: Her plew coat was a luxurious shield against the cold.
meanings.sent5: The plew had a rich, velvety texture.

meanings.definition: A strip of fur used as trimming on garments.
meanings.sent1: The dress was adorned with a plew of white fur.
meanings.sent2: The plew added an elegant touch to the jacket.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten tried to chase the plew dangling from the hem.
meanings.sent4: Her plew trim sparkled under the lights.
meanings.sent5: The plew trim gave the outfit a glamorous flair.

meanings.definition: To line or trim with fur.
meanings.sent1: She decided to plew the hood of her jacket for extra warmth.
meanings.sent2: He carefully plewed the edges of the gloves.
meanings.sent3: The tailor plewed the coat with precision and skill.
meanings.sent4: She plewed her boots with faux fur for a trendy look.
meanings.sent5: The designer plewed the entire coat, creating a lavish piece.
